product_name: Sea to Summit Trash Dry Sack
long_description: Store the waste generated from your next outing in this handy Trash Dry Sack from Sea to Summit. Uses any likesize plastic trash bags as liners for storing waste while on an outing where trash cans aren't available; comes with 1 trash bag. Hypalon(TM) roll-top closure provides reliable waterproof and leakproof performance. Coated nylon body makes this a lightweight yet durable choice. Hypalon loops allow a rope to be attached to the sack so it can hung from a tree to keep animals out of your waste. Nylon daisy chain webbing allows the sack to be securely attached to your kayak or pack as you travel.
short_description: Store the waste generated from your next outing in this handy Trash Dry Sack from Sea to Summit.
